name: @instructure/ui-icons
description: Icon set for Instructure, Inc. products
author: Instructure, Inc. Engineering and Product Design

scripts.build-icons:optimize: pnpm exec ui-scripts build-icons --svgoConfig svgo.config.js --config icons.config.js
scripts.build: pnpm run build:main && pnpm run build:lucide
scripts.build:lucide: pnpm exec babel lucide --out-dir lib/lucide --extensions .ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx && ES_MODULES=true pnpm exec babel lucide --out-dir es/lucide --extensions .ts,.tsx,.js,.jsx
scripts.export: pnpm run build-icons:optimize && pnpm run build:types

//script-comments.build-icons: TODO: SVGO optimization temporarily disabled with --skipOptimization during pnpm migration. The build process was modifying all 648 SVG files every time bootstrap ran, causing massive git diffs. Before re-enabling, all SVGs should be optimized in master first (separate PR). Use 'build-icons:optimize' to run with SVGO.
//script-comments.export: Note: 'export' uses build-icons:optimize to ensure published icons are optimized, while regular builds skip optimization.
